articles.description: Realme C25 price in India may be revealed soon as the company has teased the phone's launch in the country. It comes with a 6,000mAh battery and 48MP triple cameras.
articles.content:
Realme C25 price in India may be revealed soon as the company has teased the phone's launch in the country.
